name: smashlabs-backend

scripts.setup: npm install && echo 'Backend setup complete! Create a .env file with your configuration.'
scripts.db:status: node -e "const db = require('./config/database'); db.connect().then(() => console.log('Database connection successful')).catch(console.error)"
scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for Node.js'

author: SmashLabs Team
description: SmashLabs Backend API - Stress relief booking and management system
